channel.title: Flexdashboard on Learining R world
channel.description: Recent content in Flexdashboard on Learining R world

item.title: flexdashboard
item.description: How to create a flexdashboar using Rstudio First we’ll import libraries needed . library(devtools) library(dplyr) # For data manipulation library(ggplot2) # For our graphs library(Lahman) library(knitr) library(flexdashboard) In the menu bar click, File - New File - R Markdown - From Template -Flexdashboard You will be presented with a file similar to this And you can insert your code chunks as you wish. Let’s get started with text mining.
